meanings.definition: A unit of currency in Mozambique.
meanings.sent1: I exchanged my dollars for some moz to use in Mozambique.
meanings.sent2: The market in Mozambique accepts payment in moz.
meanings.sent3: I only had a few moz left, so I bought a small souvenir.
meanings.sent4: In Mozambique, the value of moz can fluctuate greatly.
meanings.sent5: The colorful moz notes make the currency easy to distinguish.

meanings.definition: A popular web browser developed by Mozilla.
meanings.sent1: I prefer using moz for browsing the internet.
meanings.sent2: Many people find moz to be a reliable web browser.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally opened too many tabs on my moz browser.
meanings.sent4: With moz, I can easily bookmark my favorite websites.
meanings.sent5: The new update for moz includes enhanced privacy features.

meanings.definition: A slang term for a moment or short period of time.
meanings.sent1: Wait a moz, I'll be right back.
meanings.sent2: Give me a moz to finish this quick task.
meanings.sent3: I'll be ready in a moz, just need to grab my keys.
meanings.sent4: The meeting will only take a moz, so don't be late.
meanings.sent5: Just a moz ago, we were all laughing together.
